review: Love their 2 for $20 deal-- especially since they added the option of two salads instead of sharing an appetizer.   Hubby and I always get Caesar salads, and he almost always gets the chicken fingers basket (but pays the upcharge for sweet potato fries).  I usually get the cedar grilled chicken, and I love the cranberry rice that comes with it.  Today,  our Caesar salads were extremely light on dressing,  but everything else was perfect.

I stopped in for a bite after a great day with friends. I ordered the pork chop and requested that it be cooked to a medium.  The server look apprehensive and said she would have to ask the manager. In a short bit she came back and said he cook and the manager said no and stated that they had to cook it well done because it was a health code violation to do otherwise. I spoke with the manager while waiting for my server to come back for me to change my order and I explained that there was no health code that prevented them from fulfilling my request. He instantly became defensive and stood over me in a bit of menacing manner. He said that he could tell from my facial expressions that I was angry. I explained that I was just unhappy that I was being told an untrue statement as an excuse. I suggested that he say it's company policy, but he insisted that he was right about the health code. Well Mr. Manager, in may of 2011 the USDA - recommend that pork be cooked to an internal temperature of 145 degrees, 15 degrees cooler than the previous standard. That is about medium in doneness. Please see:  I don't like being lied to and then treated in such a manner and will make sure to tell everyone I know about how your store treats it's customers.

Love Applebee's! Tried the fish and chips for the first time last night and it was very good! Usually order steak or burgers. Such a big menu though! The staff is very courteous, friendly, fun, and prompt! Can't wait to come back!

The Salmon is always good, service was excellent. They know how to make a good Captain & Coke, and desert this time did not arrive melted as before. The waitstaff had nice clean uniforms, but they appeared hurried and a bit frazzled, something management should address. All in all, a good visit.

Service was terrible. Waitress was inattentive and spent more time playing on her phone then helping us. Waited 3 times for refills and had to wait to pay check so long that we ended paying at a kiosk. Also wifi didn't work initially and hard to ask 2 times for help and have them reset. Food and drinks were okay.
